contact_name: Eurostat, the statistical office of the European Union
description: This indicator gives the percentage of all 18-year-olds who are still in any kind of school (all ISCED levels). It gives an indication of the number of young people who have not abandoned their efforts to improve their skills through initial education and it includes both those who had a regular education career without any delays as well as those who are continuing even if they had to repeat some steps in the past.
title: 18-year-olds in education
name: nJjJNdT2YsgDCf29jY6kw
contact_address: Joseph Bech building, 5 Rue Alphonse Weicker, L-2721 Luxembourg
rdf:
<rdf:RDF xmlns:rdf="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#" xmlns:ecodp="http://open-data.europa.eu/ontologies/ec-odp#" xmlns:foaf="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/" xmlns:dct="http://purl.org/dc/terms/" xmlns:skos="http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#" xmlns:dcat="http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#">

    <dcat:theme rdf:resource="http://eurovoc.europa.eu/1074"/>
    <dct:title xml:lang="en">18-year-olds in education</dct:title>
    <dct:title xml:lang="fr">Participation dans l'enseignement des personnes âgées de 18 ans</dct:title>
    <dct:title xml:lang="de">Bildungsbeteiligung von 18-Jährigen</dct:title>
    <ecodp:keyword xml:lang="en">education</ecodp:keyword>
    <ecodp:keyword xml:lang="en">student</ecodp:keyword>
    <ecodp:keyword xml:lang="fr">éducation</ecodp:keyword>
    <ecodp:keyword xml:lang="fr">étudiant</ecodp:keyword>
    <ecodp:keyword xml:lang="de">Bildung</ecodp:keyword>
    <ecodp:keyword xml:lang="de">Student</ecodp:keyword>
    <dct:identifier>tps00060</dct:identifier>
    <dct:description xml:lang="en">This indicator gives the percentage of all 18-year-olds who are still in any kind of school (all ISCED levels). It gives an indication of the number of young people who have not abandoned their efforts to improve their skills through initial education and it includes both those who had a regular education career without any delays as well as those who are continuing even if they had to repeat some steps in the past.</dct:description>
    <dct:description xml:lang="fr">Cet indicateur présente le pourcentage d'enfants de moins de 18 ans qui sont encore scolarisés, quelle que soit l'école (tous les niveaux de la CITE). Il indique le nombre de jeunes qui n'ont pas relâché leurs efforts pour améliorer leurs compétences par un enseignement initial et inclut à la fois ceux qui n'ont pris aucun retard dans leur parcours scolaire et ceux qui continuent bien qu'ils aient déjà redoublé.</dct:description>
    <dct:description xml:lang="de">Der Indikator gibt den Prozentsatz der 18-Jährigen an, die noch eine Schule besuchen (alle ISCED-Stufen). Er vermittelt eine Vorstellung von der Zahl der Jugendlichen, die weiterhin eine Verbesserung ihrer Fertigkeiten im Rahmen der Erstausbildung anstreben, und umfasst sowohl diejenigen, die einen regulären Bildungsweg ohne Verzögerung durchlaufen haben, als auch diejenigen, die ihren Bildungsweg fortsetzen, obwohl sie bereits einige Phasen wiederholen mussten.</dct:description>
